scripts.build: pnpm run test && pnpm run tsc && pnpm run lint
scripts.build:-test: pnpm run tsc && pnpm run lint
scripts.lint: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run eslint -- --fix
scripts.rinit: pnpm run rm && pnpm run pnpm
scripts.npm:publish: pnpm run rinit && pnpm test && publish && git checkout main && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.git-build-push: pnpm install && pnpm build && pnpm run git-push
scripts.git-publish: pnpm run git-build-push && git checkout main && git merge dev && pnpm run git-push && git checkout dev
